General.Name: Saudi Industrial Development Co.
General.Description: Saudi Industrial Development Co. manufactures and sells mattresses and sponges in the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia and internationally. It offers various pressures and structures mattresses, beds, and its accessories. The company also provides sanitary ware, wall tiles, ceramic flooring, and acrylic bathtubs; and furniture products from wood and upholstery furniture products. In addition, it engages in the wholesale and retail trade of cement, gypsum, natural marbles, home furniture and other furniture products, blankets, linens and bedspreads, and sheets. Further, the company acts as a sales agent for furniture and household goods; and rents and manages owned or leased residential and non-residential real estate properties. Additionally, it is involved in the transportation of goods and equipment; and portfolio trading in the market. The company was founded in 1992 and is headquartered in Jeddah, the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia.
General.Address: Prince Mohammed bin Abdulaziz Street, Jeddah, Saudi Arabia, 21473
